versions.release_notes:
• Now transfer money to any bank account in India with just the receiver's phone number
• Link / unlink multiple bank accounts to your existing UPI virtual address
• You can reset your MPIN and also pay for UPI collect requests from 'My Account' Page
• Post comments on your friends' activity in the feed!
• Access all our latest Offers & Alerts directly from the side menu
• Improved, optimised network & app performances
• For any queries or feedback, do reach out to us at help@mypoolin.com

• Check out the all new social feed with a new design
• Now, you can replicate the trending activities and old feed pools with a single tap
• Added groups for faster pool creation
• Revamped contacts selector
• As always, we've crushed the old bugs
• If you are liking our new experience, do take a moment to give us your feedback and rating :)

• Invite your friends to signup and earn credits to be used for your transactions only inside the app! (cannot be cashed out). Terms - https://goo.gl/qWS5D4
• Now use Paytm wallet for your payments for any pool.

• Now, get the collected amount into your mobile wallet (Mobikwik) for movies/events and use it directly for booking your tickets

• You can add your friends later as well after a group has been created for movies/events

• Improved and much faster chat layout

• Offers and Alerts Page to get the best promo codes around you

• You can also use your Oxigen wallet now for the payments of your shares to an group on the app

store_info.title: UPI Bank Transfer with Friends
store_info.description:
Use UPI (Unified Payments Interface) to transfer money to anyone with just their "mobile number". No account number, IFSC, beneficiary registration required now!

The best part - it is completely free and the money transfer happens instantly (in less than 5 seconds)

You can transfer up to Rs 1 Lakh per transaction multiple times and it is 24*7, available on all days including public holidays and Sundays.

Some of the banks live with us are :
• Andhra Bank
• Allahabad Bank
• Axis Bank
• Bank of Baroda ( BOB )
• Bank of Maharashtra
• Bharatiya Mahila Bank
• Canara Bank
• Catholic Syrian Bank
• Central Bank of India
• DCB Bank Ltd
• Federal Bank
• HDFC Bank Ltd
• HSBC
• ICICI Bank
• IDBI Bank Ltd
• IDFC Bank
• Indusind Bank
• Indian Bank
• Karnataka Bank
• Kotak Mahindra Bank
• Oriental Bank of Commerce ( OBC )
• Punjab National Bank ( PNB )
• RBL
• South Indian Bank
• State Bank of India ( SBI )
• Standard Chartered Bank
• TJSB
• UCO Bank
• Union Bank of India
• United Bank of India
• Vijaya Bank
• Yes Bank Ltd


UPI payment transfer is 100% safe and reliable and is approved by RBI (Reserve Bank of India)

We take care of all your daily payments with -

⦿ Split & Settle

Settle bills with UPI in two taps and sit back as we remind your friends to pay their share! The reminders are sent automatically so that you are saved from uncomfortable “You Owe Me” reminders . The process is very simple, whether you want to collect money from a single person or a large group of people. And the payments become faster with UPI (Unified Payments Interface)

⦿ Plan & Pay

Whether it is for movies, events, gifting, food & dining, travel, party or anything, share a plan with friends and chat with them to discuss who is in, who is out, what to gift, what to order, where to travel - anything!



⦿ Features of Mypoolin

• List of awesome ideas (events, movies, gifts and trips) to share with friends with a tap
• Chat with friends about any idea you are planning for, within the app
• Toggle to set your status - Confirm or Decline a plan
• Everyone in the group pays their own share, hence avoiding uncomfortable 'You Owe Me's
• Instant peer to peer transfers and payments with UPI (Unified Payment Interface)
• Experience simple and lightning fast 1-to-1 payments from any bank account to any bank account in the country
• Explore the most popular trending ideas/activities around you as well as what your friends are up to!

⦿ For planning, we have tons of choices for you to pick from across all our online partners like BookMyShow, MakeMyTrip and more

⦿ What about security and reliability?

• The best part is - your share of payment is kept safe with our partners like PayU, Mobikwik, Paytm & others till the pool is complete! Our payment partners use extremely secure and certified state of the art gateways to process your payments. Further UPI is completely safe and secure.

In order to ensure the safest payments, we have partnered with Yes Bank for processing the UPI registration and payments process for all of you. In terms of support, we allow you to link any bank that is live on UPI like ICICI Bank, Axis Bank, Yes Bank and many more.

• Anyone in your group can pay using mobile wallets or any debit, credit card, net banking and UPI. If the pool is cancelled, your money gets refunded instantly to that particular wallet or within 7 working days into your bank account that was used for payment.


⦿ What are the charges for using Mypoolin?

Mypoolin is completely free for all transactions including UPI payments.

Now there’s nothing in the way for you and your friends to get irritated with. Spend more time doing things rather than dilly-dallying

Go Cashless

🙂 SUPPORT

We are committed to consistently improve our product to help make your life easier.
☎ Phone / Whatsapp : +91-9599771577.
✯ Email : help@mypoolin.com
store_info.short_description: Fastest way to transfer money with your friends using UPI, any bank to any bank
